UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Identification and characterization of a novel antimicrobial peptide from the venom of the ant Tetramorium bicarinatum.
Literature.Author: Rifflet A, Gavalda S, Téné N, Orivel J, Leprince J, Guilhaudis L, Génin E, Vétillard A, Treilhou M

Literature.Title: Biochemical and biophysical combined study of bicarinalin, an ant venom antimicrobial peptide.
Literature.Author: Téné N, Bonnafé E, Berger F, Rifflet A, Guilhaudis L, Ségalas-Milazzo I, Pipy B, Coste A, Leprince J, Treilhou M

Literature.Author: Guzman J, Téné N, Touchard A, Castillo D, Belkhelfa H, Haddioui-Hbabi L, Treilhou M
